title: Attempting to Reconnect
body:
Just started a ranked game, and 2 minutes in i get an "Attempting to reconnect", and now that i've closed and reopened league, i still cant connect back into the game.. My Internets working fine, anyone else experiencing issues?


EDIT: Seems like the game disbanded.. it would have been 8 minutes in. Tried reconnecting and i got the message "Game no longer exists"... So.. yeah.. didn't count as a game and it doesnt exist in my match history either

replies.body: It might be that the servers are pooping themselves. Wait about a day and then try playing a custom game.
